0676859C4A978989716464A1CBE815EF: Spawns a driveable Sportbike motorcycle that can be configured.
E7F258EC4AAC080772BC61B4B05E52C8: Spawns a driveable Sportbike motorcycle that can be configured.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.On Player Enters Vehi: A player enters the spawned vehicle
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.On Player Exits Vehic: A player exits the spawned vehicle
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.On Vehicle Spawns.Des: A vehicle is spawned or respawned.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Apply OffRoad Tires.D: Apply off-road tires to the vehicle if the vehicle can receive them.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Boost Fuel Use.Descri: Controls how quickly the vehicle will use fuel while boosting.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.FuelUseMultiplier.Des: Controls how quickly the vehicle will use fuel while driving.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Vehicle Health.Descri: Determines how much damage the vehicle can take before destruction.
Determines how quickly the boost meter fills.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Boost Enabled.Descrip: Determines if boost is enabled on vehicle
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Unlimited Boost.Descr: Determines if boost should consume fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Vehicle Indestructibl: Determines if the Vehicle can be destroyed by damage.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Destroy when Stuck Un: Determines if the Vehicle will destroy itself when stuck underwater.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.EnableRespawn.Descrip: Determines if the Vehicle will respawn after being destroyed.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Fuel Consumption.Desc: Determines if the spawned vehicle uses fuel.
Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. If set to CREATE ONLY, will only be enabled while editing your Island.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Max Random Starting F: Determines the maximum random fuel percentage the vehicle will spawn with. If Max is less than or equal to Min, the vehicle will spawn with default fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Min Random Starting F: Determines the minimum random fuel percentage the vehicle will spawn with. If Max is less than or equal to Min, the vehicle will spawn with default fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Visual Variant.Descri: Determines the visual variant applied for the spawned vehicle.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Visible During Game.D: Determines whether the device is visible during the game. This does affect its collision properties.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Disable.Description: Disable the Vehicle Spawner, stopping it from spawning any more vehicles.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Enable.Description: Enable the Vehicle Spawner, allowing it to spawn vehicles.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Allowed Class.Descrip: If set to All, All Classes (including players with NO CLASS) are affected. Otherwise, the chosen Class will be used to determine the Affects Class effect. ANY CLASS - Players with a Class assigned, regardless of what Class it is. NO CLASS - Players without any assigned class.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Destroy Vehicle.Descr: If the vehicle that this spawner created still exists, destroy it.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Destroy Vehicle When: ON will destroy an already spawned vehicle when this spawner is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Pop All Tires.Descrip: Pop all of the tires on the vehicle, if the vehicle has tires to pop.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Repair All Tires.Desc: Repair all of the tires on the vehicle, if the vehicle has tires to repair.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Repair Vehicle.Descri: Restore the spawned vehicle to full health.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Remove Tire Modificat: Revert to road tires on the vehicle if the vehicle can receive them.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Assigns Driver.Descri: Seats the player that instigated the message as the spawned vehicle's driver.
Spawn the vehicle with a random percentage of fuel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Respawn Vehicle.Descr: Spawns the vehicle (Destroying the existing vehicle if it still exists).
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Activating Team.Descr: The Team this device belongs to.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Starting Fuel.Descrip: The percentage of fuel in the vehicle's fuel tank at spawn.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Water Destruction Tim: When the vehicle becomes too deep in water to drive, destroy it after this delay.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Respawn Time.Descript: When the vehicle is destroyed, respawn it after this delay. (The first vehicle spawned does not use this delay.)
UserOptionDefinition.Device_Sportbike_C.Respawn Vehicle When: YES will spawn a vehicle when the device is enabled. ONLY IF NEEDED will not reset an existing vehicle.
